com.freedomotic.nlp

Interface Nlp<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NlpCommand
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NlpCommandStringDistanceImpl

    public interface Nlp<T>
    Takes in input some text, analyzes it to compute a similarity value related to a set of predefined object avaliable to the system (eg: automation commands)
    Author:
    Enrico Nicoletti

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Nlp.DescendingRankComparator 
      static class  Nlp.Rank<T> 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Nlp.Rank<T>> computeSimilarity(String inputText, int maxResults)
      Analyzes the text and ranks object of type T according to their similarity value.

    • Method Detail

      • computeSimilarity

        List<Nlp.Rank<T>> computeSimilarity(String inputText,
                                  int maxResults)
                                    throws NoResultsException
        Analyzes the text and ranks object of type T according to their similarity value. This objects are typically Commands, for example a speech recognition algorithm returns a text and you want to identity the most similar predefined command to execute it. Beware that computing similarity may be CPU intensive. Similarity may be computed with different algorithms by the implementing classes.
        Parameters:
        inputText - The text to analyze
        maxResults - The maximum number of result elements
        Returns:
        Throws:
        NoResultsException
